explorer

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • explorer.Action

  • public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Action. Has all the actions a Crew Member can perform.

    • Method Detail

      • checkActions

        public boolean checkActions(CrewMember member)
        Check actions.
        Parameters:
        member - checks if the Crew Member can perform the action.
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • changeActions

        public void changeActions(CrewMember member)
        Change actions.
        Parameters:
        member - reduces the Crew Member action by 1.

      • foodRoll

        public void foodRoll(Ship ship)
        Random number generated food roll.
        Parameters:
        ship - updates the ships inventory with a Food Item found.

      • searchRoll

        public void searchRoll(int chance,
                       Adventure adventure)
        Random number generated search roll. Will only roll if RNG less than or equal to TreasureHunting of Crew Member being used.
        Parameters:
        chance - the Crew Member chance of finding an item
        adventure - holds information such as the Ship to be updated

      • searchPlanet

        public void searchPlanet(Adventure adventure,
                         CrewMember member)
        Attempts to search the planet for parts, items or gold pieces.
        Parameters:
        adventure - to check if an instance of Explorer is true
        member - the member being used for the search

      • feedMember

        public void feedMember(java.util.ArrayList<CrewMember> chosenCrew,
                       CrewMember member,
                       Item item,
                       Ship ship)
        Crew Member consumes an Item to restore health, reduce tiredness, hunger or become disease free.
        Parameters:
        chosenCrew - the chosen crew list used to check if the crew has a Chef.
        member - the Crew Member chosen to be fed.
        item - the Item picked for the crew member to consume.
        ship - the Ship inventory for the Item to be removed.

      • repairShip

        public void repairShip(Adventure adventure,
                       CrewMember member)
        Repairs the ships shields based on the Crafting value from a Crew Member.
        Parameters:
        adventure - the Adventure Ship shieldLevel gets updated by a value
        member - the Crew Member's Crafting value is used to repair the Ship.

      • sleepCrew

        public void sleepCrew(java.util.ArrayList<CrewMember> chosenCrew,
                      CrewMember member)
        Rests a Crew Member to help reduce their Tiredness
        Parameters:
        chosenCrew - used to check if instance of a Doctor.
        member - the Crew Member chosen to rest

      • pilotShip

        public void pilotShip(java.util.ArrayList<CrewMember> chosenCrew,
                      Adventure adventure)
        Choose Crew Members to pilot the Ship and go to a new Planet.
        Parameters:
        chosenCrew - cycles through the list and Player can pick two Crew members to pilot the Ship.
        adventure - used to initialize a new Planet Class.
